name: Level 1 Boss
description:
Due to an unforeseen shortage of early-game bosses, we need you to cover our Level 1 dungeon today.

We understand that you're used to fighting tougher opponents, but times are hard and we need everyone to pitch in. DemonCo is a family business after all.

Please go easy on the Level 1 adventurers, this will be their first boss fight. Let their attacks hit you and make your defeat as believable as possible.

You will no doubt end up attacking on instinct, please ensure your fireballs do not hit the inexperienced adventurers, they will likely not survive.

*** PLEASE DO NOT KILL THE ADVENTURERS ***

Thank you for your understanding,

Signed Robert B. Demonmann (CEO DemonCorp)

HOW TO PLAY:

Move the demon left and right with the arrow keys. Try to get hit by the adventurers attacks and avoid shooting them with your fireballs when the yellow power meter is full.
